com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j

Class StreamServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.StreamServer

  • public class StreamServer
extends java.lang.Object
    A multi-threaded streaming server that uses JSON-RPC over sockets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      class  StreamServer.Server
      Server thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamServer

        public StreamServer(JsonRpcBasicServer jsonRpcServer,
                    int maxThreads,
                    java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket)
        Creates a StreamServer with the given max number of threads using the given ServerSocket to listen for client connections.
        Parameters:
        jsonRpcServer - the JsonRpcBasicServer that will handleRequest requests
        maxThreads - the mac number of threads the server will spawn
        serverSocket - the ServerSocket used for accepting client connections
